structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.catch_line: Cabinet's functions as to tobacco addiction and alcohol and other drug abuse -- Authority for administrative regulations -- Required services.

text.section: The cabinet shall comply with all policy recommendations of the Office of Drug Control Policy and KY-ASAP, and shall honor requests for information from the Office of Drug Control Policy created under KRS 15A.020.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 256, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 536, sec. 30, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 334, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.
